attributes.action: Televise CCTV Footage of attacks in GBC Television
attributes.additional_details:
A lot of night time brutal attacks have been happening around Gibraltar. There is very little CCTV around the rock to help protect the community.  CCTV should be placed everywhere in Gibraltar. For the few that have managed to get some CCTV footage it should be televised in GBC Television to identify these criminals.
I need everyones support to help minimize crime in Gibraltar.
